prolog.io
Class Parser

java.lang.Object
  java.io.StreamTokenizer
      prolog.io.Lexer
          prolog.io.Parser

public class Parser
extends Lexer

Simplified Prolog parser: Synatax supported: a0:-a1,...,an. - no operators ( except toplevel :- and ,) - use quotes to create special symbol names, i.e. compute('+',1,2, Result) and write(':-'(a,','(b,c)))
